ygData.subject: RE: Ok, the magician summoned underwater breathing is here, /feedback time
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting, originally I think they appeared on test with 2 charges.  I suspect the bitching of tinkers may have had an impact :) So it looks like a
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting, originally I think they appeared on test with 2 charges. I
suspect the bitching of tinkers may have had an impact :)

So it looks like a rebreather is still the ultimate in underwater breathing
but a water stone is an excellent emergency measure for when the party gets
in a bind.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Daniel Larsson" <Daniel.Larsson@...>

Well, the summoned water stone has one (1) charge of enduring breath,
and the stone is lore, so I still think (hope) there is a market out there
for
us. I was about the only happy magician on Bristlebane last night, I think
;)

Miffe Treetall

PS: How about this for luck. Made 4 aqua lung attempts last night, 3
succeeded and skill raised from 102 to 104!
